questions.prompt: The story "Daniel and the Lion's Den" involves...

choices.title: The first man created by God
A lion who symbolizes the devil and evil
A man who is punished by others for refusing to stop praying to God
The son of Abraham who had a dream of a ladder connecting heaven and earth

questions.prompt: The following description of "THE INDIVIDUAL" refers to which allusion?
questions.passage: A Jewish man who was robbed and beaten on a bandit infester road cries for help. A Rabbi and a Levite pass without helping him, paranoid over it being a trap/trick. THE INDIVIDUAL then goes on to take the man to an inn and pay for his care.

questions.prompt: Why did Didymus not believe that Jesus had been resurrected?

choices.title: He knew that the disciples spoke of a figurative resurrection, not a literal one
He had not seen Jesus's scars for himself
He did not believe that Jesus had been killed in the first place
He participated in Jesus's crucifixion and ensured that Jesus could not return

questions.prompt: How many disciples did Jesus have?
